sentences.en: A new - type stethoscope has yet to be invented.
sentences.cn: 新型的听诊器有待发明.

sentences.en: Diagnostic studies included scrotal scan, Doppler stethoscope or color duplex ultrasonogram.
sentences.cn: 而诊断的方法可使用核医阴囊扫描, 杜卜勒听诊器或彩色杜卜勒超音波检查.

sentences.en: Future capabilities, Mr Murphy hopes, might include a digital stethoscope to analyse breathing sounds and a haematoma scanner to look for a brain haemorrhage.
sentences.cn: 墨菲先生希望，未来该装置的功能还包括：一个数字听诊器来分析呼吸声，一个血肿扫描仪以寻找脑部出血点。

sentences.en: He invented a new type of stethoscope.
sentences.cn: 他发明了一种新型听诊器.

sentences.en: I am specifically interested in your stethoscope model 520.
sentences.cn: 我公司对你方的520型听诊器很感兴趣.

sentences.en: I leaned in the corner, stripped of my stethoscope and white coat of authority, as Chip stood examining Ruth.
sentences.cn: 我站在角落里，摘掉我戴着的听诊器脱掉白大褂，静静地等待科迪给如斯进行体检。

sentences.en: I take it you know what a stethoscope is.
sentences.cn: 我想你知道听诊器是个什么东西.

sentences.en: I'll get my stethoscope and listen to your lung.
sentences.cn: 我要用听诊器听你肺部.

sentences.en: Later, Laennec built a hollow wooden cylinder and named it the stethoscope.
sentences.cn: 后来, 他做了个空心木圆筒,名之为[听诊器].

sentences.en: Let me listen to your chest with the stethoscope.
sentences.cn: 让我用听诊器听听你的胸部.

sentences.en: Listen to entire inspiration and expiration at each stethoscope position.
sentences.cn: 每一听诊部位听诊均应呼、吸完整.

sentences.en: Listening to a purring cat through a stethoscope is also a great relaxation technique.
sentences.cn: 用听诊器听猫发出呼噜呼噜的声音，也是很好的放松技巧。

sentences.en: Rene Laennec , French physician who invented the stethoscope in 1819, died.
sentences.cn: 1819年发明听诊器的法国医生勒内·雷奈克逝世.

sentences.en: The doctor is examining his heart with the help of a stethoscope.
sentences.cn: 医生正在用听诊器检查他的心脏.

sentences.en: The physician was aided by the stethoscope.
sentences.cn: 这医生有听诊器的帮助.

sentences.en: The stethoscope is a medical instrument.
sentences.cn: 听诊器是一种医疗器械.

sentences.en: Then the doctor listens to his chest with a stethoscope.
sentences.cn: 然后医生用听诊器听他的胸腔.

sentences.en: Through his stethoscope, Noah Townsend's clinical notes revealed, he heard suppressed breath sounds and lung rales.
sentences.cn: 从诺亚·汤森的诊断记录上可以看出, 他在听诊时发现有呼吸受到压抑的声音,肺部有罗音.

trans.tran_en: an instrument that a doctor uses to listen to your heart or breathing
